title: Can you see Replays in new client from games that were on Old Client?
body: So i made a Awesome play, whille on Old client but i want to see a replay. Can i go back to New Client and see The Replay?

replies.body: The new client lets you download your replays, yeah. I'm not sure if you needed to download new client data before you played your game or not, but I don't think so. I remember the first time I booted up the new client I was able to download some replays that were played on the old client right away.

Replays are currently being testing on the updated client, so the old client shouldn't save them.  Per the [replays ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips)guide, replays will also only work on the current patch so anything older won't be accessible.  You should be able to download the updated at any time through your patcher!  I hope that helps!
